# My Cool App

## Overview
A simple todo application for personal use.

## Features
- Create and delete tasks
- Mark tasks as complete
- Sort by date or priority
- Dark mode support

## Tech Stack
- React + TypeScript
- SQLite for local storage
- Electron for desktop packaging

## Requirements
- Must work offline
- Must support keyboard shortcuts
- Data stays local, no cloud sync

## Security
- No authentication needed (single-user)
- Local SQLite database only
